thread.title: The 20-year chart that shows a looming crunch for dividend shares
thread.title_full: The 20-year chart that shows a looming crunch for dividend shares

author: Ed Monk
title: The 20-year chart that shows a looming crunch for dividend shares
text: The 20-year chart that shows a looming crunch for dividend shares The chart showing the "dividend cover" on leading shares is nosediving, spelling trouble for income investors Run for cover: It may become harder for fund managers to find income. Photo: AFP By Ed Monk , Investment Editor 7:11AM BST 19 Sep 2015
